title:  "Logic Puzzle 13 - Cipher Heyawake"
date: 2023-10-03 10:00:00 -0400
tag: Logic Puzzle
---

@polmanpoppins (on Twitter) posted this [great Cipher Aqre](https://twitter.com/polmanpoppins/status/1708938307596419431?s=46&t=_GNJgV7RpTqIT4fjvh4Dng){:target="_blank"} that I really enjoyed, so I was inspired to make my own Cipher puzzle! Here is a Cipher Heyawake. 

Rules: Normal Heyawake rules apply. Each letter represents a number, and different letters represent different numbers.

[Penpa+ (Answer Check Enabled)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/?m=solve&&a=VYzBDUUhDMN24cyB/rYUZkHsvwbPuX2psqLgcE6zka1/3NBCLPgz6ENUEy5OccHUaypPfOcDxwgmSZfM5ExSoRRK0S28He3283f3AQ==){:target="_blank"}
